text: Wannie Sterken (27 April 1943 â€“ November 2024) was a Dutch professional football player. He played as a midfielder or forward. Sterken was most known for playing with PEC Zwolle during the 1960s. He was topscorer of the club in 1964. Next to the 19 goals in competition, he also scored at the KNVB Cup. As midfielder he was known for passing great assists. He later played also with Be Quick '28 (1965-1968) and (1968-1974). Sterken died in November 2024 at the age of 81 years. ==References== ==Other websites== *Newspaper image of Sterken *Image of Sterken Category:1943 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Dutch footballers Category:Sportspeople from Overijssel
title: Wannie Sterken
